DataElement.preferredName: World Health Organization Human Semen Examination Laboratory Sample Manual Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A United Nations agency established to coordinate international health activities and to help governments improve health services._The bipedal primate mammal, Homo sapiens; belonging to man or mankind; pertaining to man or to the race of man; use of man as experimental subject or unit of analysis in research._The fluid containing the spermatozoa, secreted by the testes and accessory reproductive glands of the male._A formal or careful inspection of an object or subject._A document prescribing work processes and procedures to be followed in the collection, handling and shipping of samples. [Adapted from TMF-RM]_The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A United Nations agency established to coordinate international health activities and to help governments improve health services.:The bipedal primate mammal, Homo sapiens; belonging to man or mankind; pertaining to man or to the race of man; use of man as experimental subject or unit of analysis in research.

Concepts.definition: A United Nations agency established to coordinate international health activities and to help governments improve health services.
The bipedal primate mammal, Homo sapiens; belonging to man or mankind; pertaining to man or to the race of man; use of man as experimental subject or unit of analysis in research.

Property.preferredDefinition: The thick, whitish secretion of the male reproductive organs. It is composed of spermatozoa in their nutrient plasma, secretions from the prostate, seminal vesicles, and various other glands, epithelial cells, and minor constituents.:A formal or careful inspection of an object or subject.:A document prescribing work processes and procedures to be followed in the collection, handling and shipping of samples. [Adapted from TMF-RM]

Concepts.definition: The thick, whitish secretion of the male reproductive organs. It is composed of spermatozoa in their nutrient plasma, secretions from the prostate, seminal vesicles, and various other glands, epithelial cells, and minor constituents.
A formal or careful inspection of an object or subject.
Documentation describing work processes and procedures for the collection, handling, and shipping of a sample.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: The World Health Organization's (WHO's) 2010 WHO Laboratory Manual for the Examination and Processing of Human Semen, Fifth Edition, provides a standardized protocol for collection, analyses, and interpretation of sperm parameters such as sperm numbers, sperm motility, sperm morphology, and azoospermia.

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 7/19/2022: fixed the box symbol in PQT.wz
